description: Try our easy to follow Roast Beef with Yorkshire Pudding recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast beef,High protein,Roast,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Easter,Beef
name: Roast Beef with Yorkshire Pudding Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 190°C. Line a baking dish with baking paper and place a small rack into the dish.
Calculate cooking time according to the packet instructions.
Remove plastic wrapping and place meat onto rack. Roast for calculated time, turning halfway through.
Meanwhile, sift flour and salt into a bowl and make a well in the centre.
Whisk egg, milk and horseradish cream in a jug. Stir into the flour until smooth.
Five minutes before end of the cooking time for the meat, increase oven temperature to 220°C.
Place 1 teaspoon of oil into each hole of a medium 12-hole muffin tray.
Remove meat from oven and cover with foil and allow to rest for 15 minutes.
Place muffin tray on the top shelf and heat for 5 minutes.
When oil is heated, remove from oven and quickly pour batter evenly between the holes. Return to oven and cook for 20 minutes until golden and puffed.
Slice meat and serve with Yorkshire puddings.
